bibliographic-data.invention-title: Trading Tools for Electronic Trading

abstract.p: Tools for trading and monitoring a commodity on an electronic exchange using a graphical user interface and a user input device. The tools will aid the trader in determining the status, trends in the market, and the trader's position in the market.

abstract.p: Tools for trading and monitoring a commodity on an electronic exchange using a graphical user interface and a user input device. The tools will aid the trader in determining the status, trends in the market, and the trader's position in the market.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Negociação baseada em clique com exibição de grade intuitiva de perfuração do mercado

abstract.p: "NEGOCIAçãO BASEADA EM CLIQUE COM EXIBIçãO DE GRADE INTUITIVA DE PERFURAçãO DO MERCADO". Um método e um sistema para redução do tempo que leva para que um negociante faça uma ordem, quando negociando eletronicamente em um câmbio, desse modo aumentando-se a tendência de o negociante ter as ordens preenchidas em preços e quantidades desejáveis. A exibição "Mercury" e o método de negociação da presente invenção asseguram uma execução rápida e precisa de negócios, pela exibição da profundidade de mercado em um plano vertical ou horizontal, o qual flutua logicamente para cima ou para baixo, para a esquerda ou a direita através do plano, conforme as flutuações dos preços de mercado. Isso permite que o negociador negocie de forma rápida e eficiente.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Comercialização com exposição de profundidade e preço do mercado

abstract.p: "COMERCIALIZAçãO COM EXPOSIçãO DE PROFUNDIDADE E PREçO DO MERCADO". Método e sistema para a redução do tempo que leva para um negociante colocar um negócio quando comercializando eletronicamente em uma central, assim, aumentando a probabilidade de que o negociante terá pedidos preenchidos em pregos e quantidade desejadas. A tela Mercury e o método de comercialização da presente invenção asseguram execução rápida e precisa de negócios através da exposição da profundidade de mercado em um plano vertical ou horizontal, que flutua logicamente para cima ou para baixo, para a esquerda para direita através do plano à medida que os preços do mercado flutuam. Isso permite ao negociante comercializar rápida e eficientemente.

A característica de consolidação do preço da presente invenção, conforme descrito, permite ao negociante consolidara um número de preços a fim de condensar a tela. Essa ação permite a um negociante visualizar uma faixa maior de preços e um número maior de pedidos no mercado em qualquer dado momento. Através da consolidação de preços e, portanto, de pedidos, o negociante reduz o risco de uma rolagem de pedidos favorável da tela antes do preenchimento de uma oferta ou solicitação naquele pedido em um preço favorável.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CLICK BASED TRADING WITH INTUITIVE GRID DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH
TRANSACTION DECLENCHEE PAR UN CLIC AVEC AFFICHAGE INTUITIF DE GRILLE DE PROFONDEUR DE MARCHE

abstract.p: A method and system for reducing the time it takes for a trader to place a trade when electronically trading on an exchange, thus increasing the likelihood that the trader will have orders filled at desirable prices and quantities. The "Mercury" display and trading method of the present inventio n ensure fast and accurate execution of trades by displaying market depth on a vertical or horizontal plane, which fluctuates logically up or down, left or right across the plane as the market prices fluctuates. This allows the trad er to trade quickly and efficiently.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADING WITH DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH AND PRICE
ECHANGES COMMERCIAUX S'APPUYANT SUR UNE PRESENTATION DE LA CAPACITE D'ABSORPTION ET DES PRIX DU MARCHE

abstract.p: A method and system for reducing the time it takes for a trader to place a trade when electronically trading on an exchange, thus increasing the likelihood that the trader will have orders filled at desirable prices and quantities. The "Mercury" display and trading method of the present inventio n ensure fast and accurate execution of trades by displaying market depth on a vertical or horizontal plane, which fluctuates logically up or down, left or right across the plane as the market prices fluctuate. This allows the trade r to trade quickly and efficiently. The price consolidation feature of the present invention, as described herein, enables a trader to consolidate a number of prices in order to condense the display. Such action allows a trad er to view a greater range of prices and a greater number of orders in the mark et at any given time. By consolidating prices, and therefore orders, a trader reduces the risk of a favorable order scrolling from the screen prior to filling a bid or ask on that order at a favorable price.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Trading tools for electronic trading

abstract.p: The invention provides a method used for re-locating information relating to multiple commodities on a graphical user interface. The method comprises steps of receiving market information including multiple interested items and relating to the multiple commodities, each interested item being associated with a price

displaying first views of multiple indicators, each indicator indicating the interested item associated with one of the multiple commodities and being displayed in association with a first part of one of multiple static price axles which correspond to the different commodities
linking the multiple static price axles, each linked static price axle corresponding to at least one of the multiple commodities
selecting a main commodity of one of the static price axles linked correspondingly
responding to a received user order to re-locating the main commodity and re-locating each linked static price axle
displaying second views of the multiple indicators indicating the interested items associated with the linked commodities
and displaying the multiple indicators at different positions.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRANSACION BASADA EN UN CLIC CON VISUALIZACION INTUITIVA DE RED DE PENETRACION DE MERCADO.

abstract.p: Un dispositivo para el cliente, para recibir órdenes con relación a un producto o artículo que está siendo negociado en una bolsa electrónica, que comprende: una interfaz para recibir datos relativos a dicho producto o artículo desde la bolsa electrónica, comprendiendo los datos al menos un precio de oferta máximo actual y un precio de demanda mínimo actual disponibles para dicho producto
medios para establecer un parámetro de órdenes de compra-venta

medios para presentar visualmente un primer indicador en una primera zona alineada con un primer nivel de precios en un campo de precios estático, estando el primer indicador asociado con el precio de oferta máximo actual para dicho producto.

Available from: http://web.archive.org/web/20010622135748/http://www.tradingtechnologies.com/products/xtrader.htm (dated by: http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.tradingtechnologies.com/products/xtrader.htm) [Accessed 04/08/2005]

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC TRADING SYSTEM

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a trading system for dramatically shortening a time required for a user when electronically trading at an exchange. SOLUTION: This trading system for displaying the market depth of commodities traded in the market displays a plurality of integrated static prices 1714 arrayed in a predetermined direction
a plurality of integrated dynamic bits corresponding to each of the plurality of integrated prices arrayed in the predetermined direction in a bit display region 1710
and a plurality of integrated dynamic asks corresponding to each of the plurality of integrated prices arrayed in the predetermined direction in an ask display region 1714.

In this case, the plurality of integrated bids and the plurality of integrated asks express the market depth of commodities, and the plurality of integrated prices express the plurality of prices of the commodities, and the plurality of integrated bits express the plurality of bid quantities of the commodities, and the plurality of integrated asks mean the plurality of ask quantities of the commodities.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2008,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC TRADING SYSTEM

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a trading system for dramatically shortening a time required for a user when electronically trading at an exchange. SOLUTION: This trading system for displaying the market depth of commodities traded in the market displays a plurality of integrated static prices 1714 arrayed in a predetermined direction
a plurality of integrated dynamic bits corresponding to each of the plurality of integrated prices arrayed in the predetermined direction in a bit display region 1710
and a plurality of integrated dynamic asks corresponding to each of the plurality of integrated prices arrayed in the predetermined direction in an ask display region 1714.

In this case, the plurality of integrated bids and the plurality of integrated asks express the market depth of commodities, and the plurality of integrated prices express the plurality of prices of the commodities, and the plurality of integrated bits express the plurality of bid quantities of the commodities, and the plurality of integrated asks mean the plurality of ask quantities of the commodities.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2008,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CLICK BASED TRADING WITH INTUITIVE GRID DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method and system for reducing the time it takes for a trader to place a trade when electronically trading on an exchange, thus increasing the likelihood that the trader has orders filled at desirable prices and quantities.

SOLUTION: The "Mercury" display and trading method ensure fast and accurate execution of trades by displaying market depth on a vertical or horizontal plane, which fluctuates logically up or down, left or right across the plane as the market prices fluctuate.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2010,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADING TOOL FOR ELECTRONIC TRADING

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide tools that can assist a trader in adapting to an electronic marketplace, and help the trader to make trades at desirable prices because an increase in the number of traders causes a more competitive market, greater liquidity, rapidly changing prices, and other changes, and by complexities that these changes bring, it is important to have a system of making the most accurate and calculated trades possible in the most efficient manner.

SOLUTION: The tools for trading and monitoring a commodity on an electronic exchange using a graphical user interface and a user input device are disclosed. The tools may aid the trader in determining statuses and trends in the market, and a trader's position in the market.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2009,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC TRADING SYSTEM

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a trading system for dramatically shortening required time for electronically trading at an exchange by a user. SOLUTION: A trading system capable of displaying market depth of commodities traded in a market displays: a plurality of integrated static prices 1714 arrayed in a predetermined direction
a plurality of integrated dynamic bids corresponding to each of the plurality of integrated prices arrayed in the predetermined direction in a bid display region 1710
and a plurality of integrated dynamic asks corresponding to each of the plurality of integrated prices arrayed in the predetermined direction in an ask display region 1714.

In this case, the plurality of integrated bids and the plurality of integrated asks express the market depth of the commodities, and the plurality of integrated prices express a plurality of prices of the commodities, and the plurality of integrated bids express separately a plurality of bid quantities of the commodities, and the plurality of integrated asks mean separately a plurality of ask quantities of the commodities.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2012,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CLICK BASED TRADING WITH INTUITIVE GRID DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH

- JPN6009054285; 次期先物オプション売買システム参加者説明会資料 , 199709, p1-18, 東京証券取引所業務システム部

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method and system for shortening a time required for a trader to place an order when electronically executing trading at an exchange, and for increasing possibility that the trader has orders filled with desirable prices and quantities.

SOLUTION: Disclosed is the "Mercury" display and trading method for enabling a trader to quickly and efficiently execute trading by displaying market depth on a vertical or horizontal plane to secure the fast and accurate execution of trading. In this case, the market depth fluctuates logically up or down, left or right across the plane as the market prices fluctuate.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2013,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ELECTRONIC TRANSACTION SYSTEM

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide an electronic transaction system which greatly shorten a time required for a user to make an electronic transaction at a bourse.

SOLUTION: The transaction system capable of displaying market depths of articles transacted on the market displays a plurality of integrated static prices 1714 lined up in a predetermined direction, a plurality of integrated dynamic bids lined up in the predetermined direction in a bid display area 1710, and corresponding to the plurality of integrated prices respectively, and a plurality of integrated dynamic asks lined up in the predetermined direction in an ask display area 1714 and corresponding to the plurality of integrated prices respectively. Here, the plurality of integrated bids and the plurality of integrated asks represent market depths of the articles, and the plurality of integrated prices represent a plurality of prices of articles, respectively

and the plurality of integrated bids represent a plurality of bid quantities of the articles, and the plurality of integrated asks represent a plurality of ask quantities of the articles, respectively.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2012,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADING TOOLS FOR ELECTRONIC TRADING

nplcit.text: JPN6009054285; 次期先物オプション売買システム参加者説明会資料 , 199709, p1-18, 東京証券取引所業務システム部

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide tools for trading products that can be traded with quantities and/or prices.

SOLUTION: A method of displaying information regarding commodities on a graphical user interface includes: displaying market information from an exchange regarding commodities, including a plurality of items of interest, on the graphical user interface, where at least one of the items of interest is order information displayed in association with an axis representing prices
displaying in association with the axis a visual indicator associated with one specific item of interest out of the plurality of items of interest
and updating the display with updated market information.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2012,JPO&INPIT

applicant-name.name: TRADING TECHNOLOGIES INTERNATIONAL, INC. ET AL

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CLICK BASED TRADING WITH INTUITIVE GRID DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH.
SISTEMA DE COMERCIALIZACION RAPIDA.

abstract.p: A method and system for reducing the time it takes for a trader to place a trade when electronically trading on an exchange, thus increasing the likelihood that the trader will have orders filled at desirable prices and quantities. The Mercury display and trading method of the present invention ensure fast and accurate execution of trades by displaying market depth on a vertical or horizontal plane, which fluctuates logically up or down, left or right across the plane as the market prices fluctuates. This allows the trader to trade quickly and efficiently.

Un metodo y un sistema para la reduccion del tiempo que toma a un comerciante colocar una negociacion cuando se comercializa electronicamente en un intercambio, ademas incrementando la probabilidad que el comerciante tendra para llenar las ordenes a precios y cantidades deseables. El metodo de comercializacion y despliegue "Mercury" de la presente invencion asegura la rapida y exacta ejecucion de las comercializaciones mediante desplegar la profundidad de mercado en un plano vertical u horizontal que fluctua logicamente hacia abajo, arriba o a la izquierda o derecha a traves del plano a medida que los precios del mercado fluctuan. Esto permite al comerciante negociar rapida y eficientemente.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADING WITH DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH AND PRICE.
COMERCIALIZACION CON DESPLIEGUE DE PROFUNDIDAD Y PRECIO DE MERCADO.

abstract.p: A method and system for reducing the time it takes for a trader to place a trade when electronically trading on an exchange, thus increasing the likelihood that the trader will have orders filled at desirable prices and quantities. The Mercury display and trading method of the present invention ensure fast and accurate execution of trades by displaying market depth on a vertical or horizontal plane, which fluctuates logically up or down, left or right across the plane as the market prices fluctuate. This allows the trader to trade quickly and efficiently. The price consolidation feature of the present invention, as described herein, enables a trader to consolidate a number of prices in order to condense the display. Such action allows a trader to view a greater range of prices and a greater number of orders in the market at any given time. By consolidating prices, and therefore orders, a trader reduces the risk of a favorable order scrolling from the screen prior to filling a bid or ask on that order at a favorable price.

Un metodo y sistema para reducir el tiempo que le toma a un comercializador efectuar una transaccion comercial cuando existe una comercializacion o intercambio via electronica, incrementando de este modo la probabilidad de que el comercializador obtenga ordenes de compra debidamente concretadas a los precios y cantidades deseados. El despliegue y metodo de comercializacion "Mercury" de la presente invencion, asegura la ejecucion rapida y exacta de las transacciones comerciales mediante el despliegue de la profundidad del mercado en un plano vertical u horizontal, que fluctua logicamente hacia arriba o hacia abajo, a la derecha o a la izquierda a lo largo de todo el plano, segun fluctuan los precios del mercado. Esto permite al comercializador realizar transacciones comerciales rapida y eficientemente.

La caracteristica de consolidacion de precio de la presente invencion, segun se describe en este documento, hace posible que un comercializador consolide cierto numero de precios para condensar el despliegue. Tal accion le permite al comercializador vislumbrar un mayor rango de precios y un mayor numero de ordenes dentro del mercado a un tiempo dado. Para consolidar los precios y por lo tanto, las ordenes, un comercializador reduce el riesgo del desplazamiento en pantalla de una orden favorable antes de concretar una licitacion o solicitar una orden a un precio favorable.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADING TOOLS FOR ELECTRONIC TRADING.
HERRAMIENTA DE COMERCIALIZACION PARA EL COMERCIO ELECTRONICO.

abstract.p: Tools for trading and monitoring a commodity on an electronic exchange using a graphical user interface and a user input device. The tools will aid the trader in determining the status, trends in the market, and the trader's position in the market.

Se describen herramientas para comercializar y monitorear una mercancia en un intercambio electronico usando una interfase grafica de usuario y un dispositivo de entrada de usuario. Las herramientas ayudaran al comerciante para determinar el estado, tendencias en el mercado y la posicion del comerciante en el mercado.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMERCIIO COM BASE NUM CLIQUE COM APRESENTACAO VISUAL INTUITIVA EM GRELHA DA PROFUNDIDADE DE MERCADO
TRADE WITH DISPLAY OF DEPTH AND PRICE OF MARKET

abstract.p: FIELD: method and system for electronic trade. ^ SUBSTANCE: in the method deals are made by displaying depth of market on vertical or horizontal plane, while depth of market oscillates logically upwardly or downwardly, to left or right along the plane with oscillation of market prices. This allows the trader to trade quickly and efficiently. Sign of price consolidation allows consolidation of several prices, to compress the display. Such operation allows the trader to see large range of prices and large number of market regulations at any given time. By means of price consolidation and resulting regulations trader decreases risk of loss of favorable regulation from display before realization of buyer proposition or seller proposition for this regulation for favorable price. ^ EFFECT: decreased time needed to finalize a deal during electronic trade at market. ^ 2 cl, 21 dwg

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADING WITH DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH AND PRICE

abstract.p: Trading With Display Of Market Depth And Price A method and system for reducing the time it takes for a trader to place a trade when electronically trading on an exchange, thus increasing the likelihood that the trader will have orders filled at desirable prices and quantities. The "Mercury" display and trading method of the present invention ensure fast and accurate execution of trades by displaying market depth on a vertical or horizontal plane, which fluctuates logically up or down, left or right across the plane as the market prices fluctuate. This allows the trader to trade quickly and efficiently. The price consolidation feature of the present invention, as described herein, enables a trader to consolidate a number of prices in order to condense the display. Such action allows a trader to view a greater range of prices and a greater number of orders in the market at any given time. By consolidating prices, and therefore orders, a trader reduces the risk of a favorable order scrolling from the screen prior to filling a bid or ask on that order at a favorable price.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CLICK BASED TRADING WITH INTUITIVE GRID DISPLAY OF MARKET DEPTH

abstract.p: An order entry device receives commands to send trade orders to an electronic exchange. It has an interface for receiving data from the electronic exchange, trade order parameter setting means, a common field of static prices, an indicator for the current highest bid, and another indicator for the lowest ask price. The indicators move when the inside market changes. The device also has an order entry region that sends an order message to the exchange based on the trade order parameter and a selected price level.

abstract.p: A method and system for reducing the time it takes for a trader to place a trade when electronically trading commodities on an exchange, thus increasing the likelihood that the trader will have orders filled at desirable prices and quantities. Click based trading, as described herein and specifically the "Click" and "Dime" methods of the present invention, enables a trader to execute single mouse click trades for large volumes of commodities at a price within a pre-specified range.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for trading and displaying market information in an electronic trading environment

abstract.p: A system and method for trading and displaying market information along a static axis are described to ensure fast and accurate execution of trades. The static axis, whether is a straight axis or a curved one, can be oriented in any direction. Regardless of how the axis is oriented, a first region may display price levels that are arranged along the static axis. A second region, which overlaps the first region, may display one or more indicators for highlighting one of the price levels associated with the lowest offer and one of the price levels associated with the highest bid. Moreover, a third region, which overlaps the first region, may be included for initiating placement of an order to buy or an order to sell the tradeable object through an action of a user input device. Other overlapping regions may also be displayed so that additional market information may be viewed by a trader.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for trading and displaying market information in an electronic trading environment
